program_information.target_population: Ultra-poor PSNP Public Works participants (bottom 10 percent)
program_information.program_name_citation: The livelihoods transfer program Aim: support the very poor to overcome the multiple barriers that prevent them from escaping poverty
program_information.target_population_citation: focus on the ultra-poor -target the bottom 10 percent of PSNP PWs participants from each beneficiary community (Kebele) by wealth ranking

component_a_cash_support.cash_frequency: one-time grant plus ongoing PSNP transfers
component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: cash grant -provide a grant, equivalent to US$200, to the selected beneficiaries to finance investment in income-generating activities | consumption support -transfers through PSNP4's PW projects

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: support the very poor to overcome the multiple barriers that prevent them from escaping poverty
